items.title: Posadas - Misiones
details: Arrival to Posadas, Province of Misiones, Argentina.
Transfer to Posadas – Hotel 3*/4*.
Welcome Cocktail at 19.00 Hs.

items.title: Las Marías - Virasoro, Corrientes
details: Breakfast at the Hotel.
Lunch at the ranch. In the afternoon, bus transfer to the hotel in Corrientes City (335 Kms).
Accommodation in Corrientes City – Hotel 3*/4*.
Spend night at your leisure, dinner not included.

items.title: ITÁ SIRI - Desmochado, Corrientes
details: Breakfast at the hotel.
Bus transfer to Ranch Itá Siri (Desmochado, Province of Corrientes - 180 Kms).
Lunch at the ranch. In the afternoon, bus transfer to the hotel in Goya, Province of Corrientes (100 Kms).
Dinner & accommodation in Goya – Hotel 3*-4*

items.title: La Victoria - Esquina, Corrientes
details: Breakfast at the hotel.
Bus transfer to Ranch La Victoria (Esquina, Province of Corrientes - 130 Kms). Lunch at the ranch. In the afternoon, bus transfer to the hotel in Corrientes City(350 Kms).
Almuerzo en la cabaña. Por la tarde traslado en bus a Corrientes (350 Kms. aprox.).
Accommodation in Corrientes City – Hotel 3*/4*
Spend night at your leisure, dinner not included.

items.title: El Bagual - Presidente Yrigoyen, Formosa
details: Breakfast at the hotel.
Bus transfer to Estancia El Bagual (Presidente Yrigoyen, Province of Formosa – 215 Kms).
Lunch in the ranch. In the afternoon, bus transfer to the hotel in Formosa City (90 Kms).
Dinner at accommodation in Formosa City – Hotel 3*/4*

items.title: La Leonor - Presidencia Roca, Chaco
details: Breakfast at the hotel.
Bus transfer to Estancia La Leonor (Presidencia Roca, Province of Chaco – 200 Kms).
Lunch at the ranch. In the afternoon, bus transfer to the hotel in Villa Ángela, Province of Chaco (240 Kms).
Closing Buffet & accommodation in Villa Ángela – Hotel 3*/4*

items.title: Los Guasunchos - Santa Margarita, Santa Fe
details: Breakfast at the hotel.
Bus transfer to Ranch Los Guasunchos (Santa Margarita, Province of Santa Fe - 130 Kms).
Lunch at the ranch. In the afternoon, bus transfer to the hotel in Corrientes City (465 Kms).
Dinner on the road (Machagai).
Accommodation in Corrientes City – Hotel 3*/4*
